title: John Fullerton: Regenerative Economics: A Necessary Paradigm Shift for a World in Crisis
itunes:title: John Fullerton: Regenerative Economics: A Necessary Paradigm Shift for a World in Crisis
description: John Fullerton, the Founder of the Capital Institute, discusses the urgent need for a new paradigm in economic thinking, modeled on living systems instead of Newtonian physics, which he calls regenerative economics.
content:encoded: John Fullerton, the Founder of the Capital Institute, discusses the urgent need for a new paradigm in economic thinking, modeled on living systems instead of Newtonian physics, which he calls regenerative economics.
itunes:subtitle: John Fullerton, the Founder of the Capital Institute, discusses the urgent need for a new paradigm in economic thinking, modeled on living systems instead of Newtonian physics, which he calls regenerative economics.
itunes:summary: John Fullerton, the Founder of the Capital Institute, discusses the urgent need for a new paradigm in economic thinking, modeled on living systems instead of Newtonian physics, which he calls regenerative economics.
itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
